## TextBoxWrapMode enumeration

Specifies how text wraps inside a shape.

```csharp
public enum TextBoxWrapMode
```

## Values

| Name | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Square | `0` | Text wraps inside a shape. |
| None | `2` | Text does not wrap inside a shape. |
